page.title: 17Child's View of Strathmiglo
page.content: I am 12 years old and I have lived here all my life.I like living in Strathmiglo because there's lots of things to do.There's lots of clubs to go to or we can go to the park where there's nearly always some one to play with.I would like to have a swimming pool here because we have to go to Cupar pool and I can only go at the weekends.If we had a pool here I could go nearly every day.There used to be a cinema here but not in my time.It would be quite good to have a cinema here but they wouldn't make enough money.Instead we have lots of country walks.At school there are only 71 pupils.I like a small school because I know everyone.I go to the library here and in Cupar. I like the Cupar one but I don't like our one becuse I have read all the good books. I would not like to move away from here.
